item.title: Thoughts on Julia: An Engineer's Take (Part 1)
item.description: Introduction Disclaimer: These views are my own and do not necessarily reflect the views of my employer. I’ve been ruminating on whether or not to write something like this for a while.

item.title: Thoughts on Julia: An Engineer's Take (Part 2)
item.description: Introduction Disclaimer: These views are my own and do not necessarily reflect the views of my employer. As the second part of my thoughts on Julia, I’d like to touch on latency and issues with testing.

item.title: Faster convolutions with Winograd (Part 2)
item.description: A charming misadventure where we discover the Winograd convolution algorithm for CNNs.

item.title: Faster convolutions with Winograd (Part 1)
item.description: With fields such as deep learning, I like to think that there are ‘definitive’ pages on the Internet.

item.title: Five Six Seven Eight: Dancing Links and DLX
item.description: The time when I mucked around with silly Sudoku puzzles and re-discovered side-effects.

item.title: My First Post
item.description: Well here we are. My first proper post. I suppose I should clarify - I was mucking about with the Hugo framework, which is used to build this site.

item.title: My Second Post
item.description: Very creative on these two post titles. Promise that’ll change for future ones (assuming they get written…). This post’s my last one for a short while, I suspect.

item.title: Contact
item.description: Please enter your details below. If you’re trying to connect with me on anything work-related then I would kindly suggest my LinkedIn profile instead.
